preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 6 grams of Boron (B). 
 2. Measure 2 grams of Chromium (Cr). 
 3. Measure 1 gram of Gallium (Ga). 
 4. Measure 20 grams of Nickel (Ni). 
 5. Combine all materials in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 6. Use a mortar and pestle or a mechanical mixer to thoroughly mix the powders until a uniform blend is achieved.
